aircraft.value: Viper Strike-3 - AC-9100-786 at Zone-1 Facility

defect_observed.value: Paint coating disbondment. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuselage Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Enhance operator training on proper usage procedures

remarks_investigation.value: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 08/03/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 11/03/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 13/03/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 13/03/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/03/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
